channel.title: The Phantom Pain (probably Metal Gear Solid 5)
channel.description:
[url]https://kotaku.com/5966779/whatever-it-is-the-phantom-pain-looks-very-intense[/url]
Only place I know with the video.
This game looks fantastic. So we have Watch Dogs, Star Wars 1313, and this game so far that are all looking like they're next gen games to me at least. And I'm excited for this one the most probably. Can't wait to crawl around like a cripple with such amazing graphics.
Here's a couple things leading people to believe it's MGS5:
The owner of the studio's name is Joakim, an anagram of Kojima The studio's logo is similar to a patch that Big Boss is wearing in the Ground Zeroes trailer There's some weird lines on top of the game logo that supposedly spell out Metal Gear Solid V
And I leave you with this [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/48700350/NextGenCrippling.gif[/img]

item.title: The Phantom Pain (probably Metal Gear Solid 5)

item.description:
This whole Joakim/Kojima thing is more interesting to me than the game itself.

Read full topic

That’s just Metal Gear.

item.title: The Phantom Pain (probably Metal Gear Solid 5)
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Ground Zeroes is its own game outside of the numbered saga.

This could either be MGS 5 or Metal Gear Liquid, according to some theories.

Read full topic
item.source: The Phantom Pain (probably Metal Gear Solid 5)

item.title: The Phantom Pain (probably Metal Gear Solid 5)
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I thought Ground Zeroes was MGS5?

Tonally, this looked a lot different than your typical Metal Gear game. Plus, the kit on the soldiers hitting the hospital looked a bit advanced for the '80s. Perhaps it’s actually Old Snake? (Considering that Kojima apparently backpedaled on his statement that MGS4 was the last we’d see of Solid Snake, this could be the case, although I was hoping he’d stick to his creative guns and keep 4 as the definitive “end.”)

Read full topic
item.source: The Phantom Pain (probably Metal Gear Solid 5)
